quotes.text: You can do anything, but not everything.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry

quotes.text: The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.text: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Ambrose Redmoon

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.text: When hungry, eat your rice; when tired, close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean.
quotes.author: Lin-Chi

quotes.text: The third-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the majority. The second-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the minority. The first-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.text: To the man who only has a hammer, everything he encounters begins to look like a nail.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow
